meanings.definition: Triticums: plural form of triticum, a genus of grasses commonly known as wheat.
meanings.sent1: Farmers planted triticums in the field to grow wheat.
meanings.sent2: The bakery used triticums to make delicious bread.
meanings.sent3: The triticums in the garden whispered secrets to the other plants.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a field of triticums, each thought a grain waiting to be harvested.
meanings.sent5: The golden triticums swayed in the breeze, painting the landscape with warmth.
